checks.title: Lawful Basis for Processing
checks.description: Ensure all data processing has a valid lawful basis under GDPR Article 6
checks.implementation: Consent tracking system implemented in audit-trail-system.ts with lawful basis documentation
evidence: User consent tracking in visibility check system

checks.title: Purpose Limitation
checks.description: Data is processed only for specified, explicit and legitimate purposes
checks.implementation: AI orchestrator limits data usage to specified business purposes with clear documentation
evidence: Business framework engine with purpose-specific processing

checks.title: Data Minimization
checks.description: Only necessary data is processed for the specified purposes
checks.implementation: PII detection and redaction system minimizes data processing to essential elements
evidence: Minimal data collection in VC system

checks.title: Data Retention Limits
checks.description: Personal data is kept only as long as necessary
checks.implementation: Automated data retention policies with configurable retention periods

checks.title: Data Security
checks.description: Appropriate technical and organizational measures for data security
checks.implementation: End-to-end encryption, KMS keys, secure storage with AWS security best practices
evidence: Encrypted data storage in RDS and S3

checks.title: EU Data Residency
checks.description: Personal data of EU residents is stored within the EU
checks.requirement: GDPR territorial scope and data residency requirements
checks.implementation: Multi-region architecture with EU-only data storage (eu-central-1, eu-west-1)

checks.title: Right to Access
checks.description: Users can access their personal data
checks.requirement: GDPR Article 15 - Right of access by the data subject
checks.implementation: Data export functionality and user data access APIs

checks.title: Right to Rectification
checks.description: Users can correct inaccurate personal data
checks.implementation: User profile management with update capabilities

checks.title: Right to Erasure
checks.description: Users can request deletion of their personal data
checks.implementation: Data anonymization and deletion procedures with complete data removal

checks.title: Right to Data Portability
checks.description: Users can export their data in a structured format
checks.requirement: GDPR Article 20 - Right to data portability
checks.implementation: Structured data export in JSON/CSV formats

checks.title: Valid Consent
checks.description: Consent is freely given, specific, informed and unambiguous
checks.implementation: Double opt-in system with clear consent mechanisms and granular consent options

checks.title: Consent Withdrawal
checks.description: Users can withdraw consent as easily as giving it
checks.implementation: Easy consent withdrawal mechanisms with immediate effect

checks.title: Encryption at Rest
checks.description: Personal data is encrypted when stored
checks.implementation: AES-256 encryption for all data storage with KMS key management

checks.title: Encryption in Transit
checks.description: Personal data is encrypted during transmission
checks.implementation: TLS 1.3 for all data transmission with certificate management

checks.title: Access Controls
checks.description: Appropriate access controls are in place
checks.implementation: Role-based access control with least privilege principle

checks.title: AI Processing Transparency
checks.description: Users are informed about AI processing of their data
checks.requirement: GDPR Article 13/14 - Information to be provided
checks.implementation: Clear disclosure of AI processing in privacy policy and consent forms

checks.title: Automated Decision Making
checks.implementation: Human oversight for AI decisions with opt-out mechanisms

checks.title: AI Data Protection
checks.description: AI systems implement privacy by design
checks.requirement: GDPR Article 25 - Data protection by design and by default
checks.implementation: Privacy-preserving AI with PII detection and data minimization

recommendations: Keep privacy policy and consent forms up to date
Train staff on GDPR requirements and data handling procedures
Maintain comprehensive audit logs for all data processing activities
